decks.notes: The deck focuses on aggressively attacking the opponent with low-cost creatures and burn spells. It utilizes cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Light Up the Stage, and Soul-Scar Mage to deal quick damage to the opponent. The inclusion of burn spells like Skewer the Critics and Play with Fire helps finish off the opponent quickly. The deck's goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures and direct damage spells, utilizing its speed and efficiency to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on building up a strong board presence quickly by ramping up mana with cards like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, and then using that mana to play powerful green creatures like Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a high devotion to green and aggressive play style, while also utilizing cards like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Storm the Festival to generate additional value and card advantage. The deck aims to win the game through sheer force and efficiency.

The deck focuses on using cards like Indomitable Creativity and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to create powerful combo plays. It utilizes a mix of spells, creatures, and enchantments to disrupt and outmaneuver opponents. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion adds an extra layer of versatility and creativity to the deck. Overall, the strategy revolves around generating value through creative card interactions and overwhelming the opponent with unexpected plays.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with green devotion cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Leyline of the Guildpact, then use that mana to play powerful green creatures like Old-Growth Troll and Cavalier of Thorns to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. The deck also includes cards like Storm the Festival and Polukranos Reborn to further support the aggressive playstyle and maintain board presence. With a focus on green devotion and big creatures, this deck aims to quickly build a strong board presence and apply pressure to the opponent.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, hand disruption, and graveyard interaction. It aims to outvalue the opponent by utilizing cards like Seasons Past and Virtue of Persistence to generate card advantage. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Vraska, Golgari Queen and Liliana of the Veil provides additional control tools and threats. Additionally, the deck leverages the companion Kaheera, the Orphanguard for additional synergy and value. The mana base is focused on providing access to all necessary colors while also supporting the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on using the companion Keruga, the Macrosage to draw cards while playing a combination of creatures and spells that allow for explosive plays and powerful synergies. The deck includes a mix of lands, creatures like Greater Tanuki, Quintorius Kand, and Spinewoods Armadillo, as well as spells like Bedeck / Bedazzle and Leyline Binding. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of card advantage, versatile threats, and disruptive plays that can lead to a quick victory.
